marklogic.body: You ended that too soon Channel 4 - that 'private' group is a story in it's own it's Vision Loss Connections and they are the guys who got Seattle Art Museum started on this journey with giving tours to those with vision loss. Patt Copeland and Tony Brown started the group that gives folk with Vision problems activities. They also attend theater and do many other fun things. You should hook up with those guys for a story all their own. They are also involved with Goal Ball a sport event. http://www.visionlossconnections.org/ SAM has been wonderful to offer these tours - but it was Patt's overture to them that created this new venue. I am Glad to see them in the news format, but there is much more to that story folk.
